subdisciplines.name: Euclidean Geometry
subdisciplines.description: The study of shapes, sizes, and positions of figures in two-dimensional space based on axioms and theorems of Euclid.

subdisciplines.name: Non-Euclidean Geometry
subdisciplines.description: The branch of geometry that does not follow the axioms and theorems of Euclidean geometry, such as hyperbolic and elliptic geometries.

subdisciplines.name: Differential Geometry
subdisciplines.description: The study of geometry using calculus and differential equations, focusing on the properties of curves, surfaces, and higher-dimensional manifolds.
